title: Chloe Ferry reveals she has SPLIT with Sam Gowland for good
text:
Chloe Ferry has revealed that she has finally called it quits on her relationship with Sam Gowland for good following their turbulent romance.

The Geordie Shore star, 24, confirmed her single status following speculation that the former couple had rekindled their relationship during a recent trip to Dubai.

The couple went public with their romance in October 2017 but split in May earlier this year after she accused him of cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies, something she vehemently denied.

It's over! Chloe Ferry has revealed that she has finally called it quits on her relationship with Sam Gowland for good following their turbulent romance

Setting the record straight on their relationship, Chloe told The Sun: 'I'm going back into Geordie Shore house in three days. I am single. I am excited about getting started.

'When you're going through a hard time it's good to be around positive energy. My mum's been supportive, she is amazing.'

Chloe apparently worried her friends last month when she was spotted arriving at the airport with Sam on a trip to Dubai.

A source told the website at the time: 'They've gone to Dubai. Her friends think she's crazy and just doing it to stop Sam from taking legal action against her.

Moving on: The Geordie Shore star, 24, confirmed her single status following speculation that the former couple had rekindled their relationship during a trip to Dubai (pictured)

'Chloe knows it's a toxic relationship but said she's willing to give it another try.'

However Sam made it clear he had moved on from her for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up.

Taking to Instagram last week, the reality star, 24, showed off his new inking of a very large bear on his thigh in a video, captioning it: 'Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending.'

Rocky road: The couple went public with their romance in October 2017 but split in May earlier this year after she accused him of cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies, something she denies (pictured in May 2018)

The large tattoo covered the previous one of Chloe's face, which he obtained when appearing on Just Tattoo Of Us.

At the time, the star was furious with his ex, exclaiming: 'Why the f**k did you do that for?'

While Chloe, who initially picked the design so she could c**k block her partner, admitted some regret about her choice adding: 'I am regretting it a little bit now. I didn't think it would be that big!'

However, the tattoo is no longer a problem for Sam as he now sports a huge inking of a roaring bear on his leg.

Single baby! Setting the record straight on their relationship, Chloe told The Sun: 'I'm going back into Geordie Shore house in three days. I am single. I am excited about getting started.'

Their relationship came crashing to an end when she dumped him after accusing him of cheating with Love Island beauty Amber, which she denies.

Things turned bitter between the pair when Chloe took to Instagram to accuse him of having sex with Amber, which they both sternly denied.

The star shared alleged messages between her ex Sam and Amber which she claims proves they had sex, despite the pair's denials.

Amber then took to Instagram to deny sleeping with Sam, and gave an explanation for the messages shared.
